ygData.subject: Playing a Troll Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Great and learned warriors.  I have decided to start playing a Troll Warrior and would like some advice.  All I know now is to grab the first two handed
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Great and learned warriors. I have decided to start playing a Troll
Warrior and would like some advice. All I know now is to grab the first two
handed sword I can find and start killing everything in site. Any
suggestions on how to play the largest evil killing machine in Norrath?

Eyebeebad
Troll Warrior of the 1st Rank
Bristlebane
